data.title: Buck-Tick - KISS ME GOOD-BYE lyrics translation in English
data.meta_description:
English translation of lyrics for KISS ME GOOD-BYE by Buck-Tick. あふれる瞳閉じたまま冷たく濡れた唇に
Kiss me good-bye (Kiss me good-bye)
これで終わりと
Make me cry
悲しい予感知りながら 白く浮か...
data.text:
Are you an artist? Make the most of your lyrics with Musixmatch Pro!

chorus

月に抱かれ、もうこのまま

As long as it is hugged by the moon

全て消えてしまえばいい

I could let it all disappear

キャンドルが消えるまで涙がかれるまで

Until the candles go out, until your tears dry

いつでも傍にいて 見つめてほしい

I want you to always be by my side and look at me

崩れてしまうほど、壊れてしまうほど

As we fall apart, as we tear ourselves apart

いつでもここにいて見つめていたい

I want to be here forever and watch you

verse

月に抱かれ もう このまま

As long as it is hugged by the moon

全て消えてしまえばいい...

I could let it all disappear

時を止めて もう ふたりの

Time stops for the both of us

幕を閉じてしまえばいい...

Until the curtain closes...

キャンドルが消えるまで 涙がかれるまで

Until the candles go out, until your tears dry

いつでも傍にいて 見つめてほしい

I want you to always be by my side and look at me
